```{r setup, message=FALSE,warning=FALSE}
library(sf)
library(NEFSCspatial)
```

The spatial data bundled in this package are in `sf` format. For the shapefiles in `sf` format, you can view the fields simply by typing the name of the data set

```{r data_sf}
NEFSCspatial::Shellfish_Strata
```

To visualize the data simply use the plot function

```{r plot_sf}
plot(NEFSCspatial::Shellfish_Strata)
```
